eu_initiatives:
The University participates extensively in the research and innovation programmes of the European Commission as well as student and staff mobility, teaching and training initiatives. In addition, the University is active in economic development schemes (e.g. ERDF and Interreg). 
 
Academics are actively encouraged to act as Expert Evaluators for H2020, and to respond to any open public consultations from the Commission.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Fertilisers Working Group#E01320#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1320#Not a member#C#Subgroup of the Commission expert group on Recovery Rules for Fertilising Products
relevant_communication:
Research findings related to EU-funded projects are communicated in a number of different ways to a wide range of people (e.g. websites, press releases, public lectures, conferences, trade magazines etc.) to help raise awareness and support exploitation of the research by the relevant beneficiaries. A list of EU projects is available upon request. 
 
In addition, a small number of Cranfield University staff sit on subject-specific advisory panels.
goals__remit:
The University will be an institute of technology and a teaching, research and examining body with power to grant Degrees. The objects of the University are to: 
1.1 advance, disseminate and apply learning, knowledge and understanding with particular emphasis on the disciplines of the Sciences, Technology, Engineering and Management; and 
1.2 promote and encourage the transformation and application of that wisdom, knowledge and learning for the benefit of industry, the public services, and individuals and for the public benefit. 
 
In fulfilling these objects, the University will give particular attention to the educational needs of industry, commerce and the public services and of people with experience therein who can benefit from an extension of their higher education and thereby be prepared for positions of greater responsibility
